trans-unit.source: Represents the results of compilation that are returned from a compiler.

This class contains the following information about the results of a compilation by an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> interface implementation: - The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.CompiledAssembly%2A> property indicates the compiled assembly.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Evidence%2A> property indicates the security evidence for the assembly.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.PathToAssembly%2A> property indicates the path to the compiled assembly, if it was not generated only in memory.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Errors%2A> property indicates any compiler errors and warnings.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Output%2A> property contains the compiler output messages.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.NativeCompilerReturnValue%2A> property indicates result code value returned by the compiler.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.TempFiles%2A> property indicates the temporary files generated during compilation and linking.
> [!NOTE] > This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
For details about inheritance demands, see [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults"></xref> class that uses the specified temporary files.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection"></xref> with which to manage and store references to intermediate files generated during compilation.
Gets or sets the compiled assembly.
An <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> that indicates the compiled assembly.
Gets the collection of compiler errors and warnings.

File and line number information is associated with each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError>, so that user code to locate and display the code that generated an error or warning, where possible, can be implemented.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref> that indicates the errors and warnings resulting from compilation, if any.
Indicates the evidence object that represents the security policy permissions of the compiled assembly.
An <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"></xref> object that represents the security policy permissions of the compiled assembly.
Gets or sets the compiler's return value.
This property contains the numeric exit code returned by a command line compiler, if implemented.
A value of 0 indicates success, while a non-zero value indicates failure.
The compiler's return value.
Gets the compiler output messages.
If the compiler returned no messages, the value of this property will be an empty collection.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> that contains the output messages.
Gets or sets the path of the compiled assembly.
The path of the assembly, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the assembly was generated in memory.
Gets or sets the temporary file collection to use.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection"></xref> with which to manage and store references to intermediate files generated during compilation.
